ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: How are people getting the white scales
ygData.msgSnippet: We seem to get Spears and Robes every time. Mu ... From: Cyr, Thierry [mailto:thierry.cyr@eds.com] Sent: Monday, May 28, 2001 10:29 AM To:
ygData.messageBody:
We seem to get Spears and Robes every time.

Mu

-----Original Message-----
From: Cyr, Thierry [mailto:thierry.cyr@...]
Sent: Monday, May 28, 2001 10:29 AM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: How are people getting the white scales


phinny is still a gimp. We usually kill him with a 6 man group. Btw, i
love 53 mez, its night and day 8). I can lock down ss guardians with it 8).

Highly competed spawn though sadly, and very insulting when he only drops
wands for enchanters and shamen.

we've gotten him very often lately, we finally got our main mage her staff,
3 out of 4 of our active wizzies their staffs, a couple of kedge robes and
no spine yet for me... 8(

Minkin
53 bard
RIP
Ayonae Ro
